    • build

      public void build​(Message mex) throws java.io.IOException
      Build function by the client. Receives the message from the server, checks if it's the client's turn and asks for the building coordinates ( [xStart;yStart] and [xDest;yDest] ). If the client who's building has the power of Hephaestus or Atlas, asks the client if wants to use its power. Sends the building coordinates to the server.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • checkAge

      boolean checkAge​(java.lang.String inputAge)
      strategy method to control if the input of the age is correct

    • insertCoordinates

      java.lang.String insertCoordinates()
      Method that allows to insert coordinates
      Returns:
      a string in format "x,y" where x and y are int

    • isNumeric
